• 30′ for structures w/roof slope < 12:12
• 33' for structures w/roof slope > 12:12
• 17' for structures on substandard or flag lots
regardless of flood plane

visual_elements.description: A side elevation diagram of a two-story house with a gabled roof and dormers, illustrating the concept of a 'Primary daylight plane (rear)'. The diagram shows various setback lines, height restrictions, and protrusion limits. A dashed line representing the daylight plane originates from the rear setback line at a 60-degree angle. Dimensions for maximum protrusion length (7.5' each), minimum separation between protrusions (5'), maximum height for protrusions (24'), and a general maximum building height are indicated. The ground is depicted with hatching, and a 'Rear yard' area is labeled between the 'Setback line' and 'Rear lot line'.

technical_specifications.parameter: Max building height for structures with roof slope < 12:12
Max building height for structures with roof slope > 12:12
Max building height for structures on substandard or flag lots (regardless of flood plane)
Max building height for structures in flood zones (except on substandard and flag lots)
Cumulative length of protrusions on any one side

sections: Fig 23 Side elevation showing Rear primary daylight plane
★Cumulative length of protrusions must not exceed 15' on any one side.

additional_notes: Page number '28' is located at the bottom left corner.

qualifiers.text: for structures on substandard or flag lots regardless of flood plane
for structures located in flood zones except on substandard and flag lots
Rear protrusions subject to same rules as side protrusions

conditions.text: Max building. height is: variable ... up to 33'
Cumulative length of protrusions must not exceed 15'

logical_relationships.expression: IF roof slope < 12:12 THEN Max building height is 30'
IF roof slope > 12:12 THEN Max building height is 33'
IF structure is on substandard or flag lots (regardless of flood plane) THEN Max building height is 17'
IF structure is located in flood zones (except on substandard and flag lots) THEN Max building height is variable up to 33'

execution_sequence.action: Determine Max building height based on roof slope and lot type.
Ensure individual protrusion length does not exceed maximum.
Ensure cumulative length of protrusions on any one side does not exceed maximum.
Ensure maximum height for protrusions is not exceeded.
Apply rules for rear protrusions as per side protrusions.
